scripts.start: npm run build-client & npm run start-redis && node index.js
scripts.start-peer: npm run build-client & npm run start-redis && cross-env GENERATE_PEER_PORT='true' node index.js
scripts.dev: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && cross-env ENV='development' nodemon index.js
scripts.dev-peer: npm run dev-client & npm run start-redis && cross-env GENERATE_PEER_PORT='true' ENV='development' nodemon index.js
scripts.build-client: npm run clean && parcel build client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-client: npm run clean && parcel client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
